verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: acknowledged] [ARGM-TMP: for the first time] [ARG1: that he repaid his lawyer Michael Cohen more than $ 100,000 for expenses Cohen incurred during the 2016 presidential election] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a financial disclosure form released Wednesday] .

President Donald Trump acknowledged for the first time that [ARG0: he] [V: repaid] [ARG2: his lawyer Michael Cohen] [ARG1: more than $ 100,000] [ARG3: for expenses Cohen incurred during the 2016 presidential election] , according to a financial disclosure form released Wednesday .

President Donald Trump acknowledged for the first time that he repaid his lawyer Michael Cohen more than $ 100,000 for [ARG1: expenses] [ARG0: Cohen] [V: incurred] [ARGM-TMP: during the 2016 presidential election] , according to a financial disclosure form released Wednesday .

President Donald Trump acknowledged for the first time that he repaid his lawyer Michael Cohen more than $ 100,000 for expenses Cohen incurred during the 2016 presidential election , [V: according] to a financial disclosure form released Wednesday .
